title: Spycloud
description:
SpyCloud monitors and tracks compromised data, such as login credentials and personal information, across the web and other sources.

The OpenCTI SpyCloud connector imports such data, aka _breach records_, from SpyCloud into OpenCTI as incidents and observables.
short_description: SpyCloud monitors and tracks compromised data, such as login credentials and personal information, across the web and other sources.
